NetFile.summary: Contains common file related static functions. (RE)
NetFile.remarks: The NetFile class contains file related static helper functions for all .NET program types.

CreateFolder.summary: Creates a Folder Path if it does not already exist. (E)

ReadAllLines.summary: Get all text lines from a file.
ReadAllLines.returns: A string array of text lines.

WriteLog.summary: Writes a string format to the Log file with the current date and time.

WriteLogLine.summary: Writes a string format plus cr/lf to the Log file with the current date and time.
